data_weight:tooltip: Data weight - logical data size independent from serialization format (8 for int64, length for strings etc.).
disk_space:tooltip: Disk space - compressed size multiplied by replication factor.
medium_disk_space:tooltip: {{name}} disk space - disk space on "{{medium}}" medium.
compressed_size:tooltip: Compressed size - sum total of all chunk sizes after compression, not taking replication factor into account.
uncompressed_size:tooltip: Uncompressed size - sum total of all chunk sizes before compression, not taking replication factor into account.
